Welcome to 9to5Toys Steals Weekly – your go-to spot for already-affordable everyday essentials that are now selling for even less. This weekly roundup pulls together all of the Steals from the past week, and puts them in a digestable list for you to consume every Saturday morning. Over the last seven days, some of our most popular Steals have included LISEN’s 5,000mAh slim MagSafe power bank for $15, The Hobbit: 75th Anniversary Edition as low as $2, and cargo jogging pants priced from $18. You can find these Steals and many more down below.

more…

items.title: Still live: Super rare deal lands on Apple’s latest USB-C Magic Keyboard with Touch ID and Numeric Keypad via Amazon
items.summary:
Amazon is now offering a super rare discount on the latest USB-C Apple Magic Keyboard with Touch ID and Numeric Keypad down at $161.99 shipped. While we have tracked some deals on the older Lightning models this year and at the tail end of 2024, price drops on the latest white edition do not happen often. 

more…

items.title: Amazon’s early fall Prime Day deal on Echo Spot just dropped even lower, now back at $45 low (45% off)
items.summary:
While we already caught some discounts live on the Echo smart speaker lineup as part of Amazon’s early Prime Big Deal Days sale, it has just dropped the Echo Spot down even lower. Pre-orders are now live on the more pricey and higher-end new Echo Dot Max and Echo Studio starting from $100, but Amazon just dropped another $5 off the already discounted Echo Spot to bring the price down to $45 shipped. 

more…

items.title: New Apple Watch Series 11 Titanium models see very first price drops at Amazon today
items.summary:
While we caught some early discounts on the base aluminum versions already (you’ll find those right here and down below), the first Amazon discounts on the new Titanium Apple Watch Series 11 models are landing this morning. We all know how much more pricey Apple’s high-end titanium models can be – they also happen to look much more premium and expensive in person if you ask me – so any amount of savings at all is worth it for folks looking to land one in the early days. Both the Sport Band and Milanese Loop models are now lower at Amazon than anywhere else. 

more…

items.title: Get productivity freedom forever with Microsoft Office Pro for just $40
items.summary:
You can make one of the smartest tech purchases of the year for just $39.97: Microsoft Office Professional 2021 for Windows with a lifetime license. No subscription fees every month (or year). No hidden renewals. Just a one-time payment for all the tools you already use daily — and will keep using for years to come.

more…

items.summary:
Battlefield 6 is less than a week away from launch, but the preorders for the game on Steam have already surpassed the 1.7 million mark. items.summary:
The official Anker Amazon storefront is now offering the best price ever on its brand new 160W display-equipped Prime Charger. We caught some launch deals on all of the brand’s new gear, but you can now use code ANKERPRIME2 at checkout to knock 30% off the list price.

Maxis has announced that it has accepted a spectrum assignment offer from the Malaysian Communications and Multimedia Commission (MCMC) worth RM400 million. items.title: New display-equipped Anker Prime 25W MagSafe charger, power bank, more now even lower with this discount code
items.summary:
As you likely already know, Anker unleashed all new Prime charging gear this week with launch deals, but you can now use ANKERPRIME2 at checkout to drop the price down on all of it. The code seems to be a bit or miss for some users on Amazon – it might just be that each account can only use it once, but give it a go. It also appears to be working directly on the Anker site for all of the new gear. The new 3-in-1 25W Prime MagSafe Charger with the onboard cooler display now drops down even lower using this code on the brand’s official Amazon storefront and directly on the Anker site. 

more…

items.title: All of our favorite early fall Prime Day deals you can score right now
items.summary:
Amazon’s early Prime Big Deal Days sale is now in full swing, with plenty of notable offers already up for grabs. While you certainly need to be careful jumping on deals today and over this weekend ahead of the main event, after many years of experience on the matter we have compiled a list of notable disocunts you can rest assured are either already live or very close to the price we are going to see next week. From Apple gear and upgrades for your smart home, to power stations and e-bikes, Amazon’s in-house tech that is already at Prime Day pricing to all-new releases not likely to drop any lower next week, you’ll find our favorite early Prime Day deals to shop right now down below.

I took the time to craft a pegboard wall for all of my tools, but folks that want a heavy-duty solution that can hold “up to 400 pounds” should have a look at this unit. The entire unit spans 36.4 by 11.7 by 8 inches and is ready to be mounted on the wall.

items.summary:
JOYROOM 175W USB-C Car Charger

Buy for $27 (Reg. $33)

Clip the on-page $6 off coupon.

What we love

This recent release is among some of most powerful car chargers we’ve come across. Offerings we’ve spotted from from Anker, UGREEN, and LISEN tend to top out with output no higher than 170W in total. This one goes a bit further at 175W. This is divvied up between two 100W and 45W Type-C ports in addition to a 30W USB-A.
